releaseNotes:
■ Ver.9.7.0 
- New functions: TimeTree Premium - Pin and save important events
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
description:
■Winner of the “App Store Best of 2015” award by Apple!

Each individual’s schedule is on one calendar. TimeTree keeps a family and a group organized. It helps manage busy lives while sharing the calendar, tasks, notes and more.

The free calendar app beloved by over 39 million users.


■Key Features

○ [Interface]
The "Full Month" view shows upcoming events quickly and by the month. You can also switch display types to "Week" and "List".
Both the monthly and weekly view display color-coded events.


○ [Share a calendar and scheduling]

・Invite new members via E-mail, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, SMS and more.

・Create and edit events for all members.

・Use the Communication section to add comments and photos to individual events.

・Reminders can be delivered to everyone in the group.

・You can sync your calendar with other calendars (Google Calendar, Outlook etc) .

○ [Share Notes and To-Do lists]
Note and To-Do List can be added in the Memo section or onto your calendar. Everyone would be able to view and make changes to the list.

○ [Multiple calendars for family, personal, work etc]
Keep individual calendars separate to keep your privacy.

○ [Works on PC & Mobile]

○ [Widgets]
TimeTree widgets in your home screen let you check and edit your schedule with ease.


■Who is TimeTree for?

○ [Family]
・Everyday scheduling conundrums like , "Mom, I keep telling you I have extra class on Thursdays!," or, " Who's picking up the kids from childcare? " beg the question. TimeTree is the most helpful family calendar and organizer.

○ [Team/Group at Work and School]
・TimeTree is great for small businesses that need to manage meetings and delegate work.
・For students who want to manage their after school sport events or any scheduled team practice times.

○ [Couples]
Perfect for couples who want to know when they are both free for dates!


■Contact us
Your experience is important to us. If you have any inquiries or feedback, please contact us. (support@timetreeapp.com)

■HP: https://timetreeapp.com/

■TimeTree Help: https://support.timetreeapp.com/hc/en-us
